components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Incerement the IOS appBadge on recieving the push notification while the app is in background or the app has been closed. 
I heard that it is possible with objective C. It would be nice if we could implement the auto increment of app badge using Titanium
I've posted the following question regarding the issue in Stack Overflow

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15136175/increment-app-badge-on-recieving-acs-push-while-app-on-background-titanium
fields.summary: Incerement the IOS appBadge on recieving the push notification
